definition: to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)

sentences.english: The infinite sky is motionless overhead and the restless water is boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 头上是静止的无垠的天空，不宁的海波奔腾喧闹。

sentences.english: A night of depth, stretched to the horizon of the curtain of night is covering up my line of sight thickly.
sentences.chinese: 夜已深，一望无垠的夜幕厚厚实实地遮掩着我的视线。

sentences.english: Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.
sentences.chinese: 你应该做的是，教他们热爱广阔无垠的海洋。

sentences.english: There is a tide of Us in the Vastness of Stillness or the Stillness of Vastness.
sentences.chinese: 有一种潮流，我们在苍茫的广阔无垠的寂静或静止。

sentences.english: To the one side of the mountain is the boundless and melancholy marsh.
sentences.chinese: 山那边是泥泽，死气沉沉，一望无垠。

sentences.english: The  infinite sky is motionless overhead And the restless water is  boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 头上无垠的天空静止，不息的海水狂暴。

sentences.english: But against the vast expanse of the sky, the chute looked very small.
sentences.chinese: 但和广阔无垠的天空相比，降落伞看起来是沧海一粟。

sentences.english: The universe is endless, without a beginning or end.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙广阔无垠，没开始和结束。

sentences.english: It is said that pauillac flower grows in the vast desert.
sentences.chinese: 据说普雅花生长在广袤无垠的沙漠里。

sentences.english: Guests can also ride camel, appreciate at the vast desert landscape.
sentences.chinese: 客人也可自费骑驼，欣赏浩瀚无垠的大漠风光。

sentences.english: I am in the drums loud and grand, the thunderous hooves across Nagrand.
sentences.chinese: 我是威武雄壮的鼓，踏过无垠草原的纳格兰。

sentences.english: Look at the vast stretches of green fields.
sentences.chinese: 看这一望无垠的绿色田野。

sentences.english: The clouds look really spectacular and the viewer has the feeling of flight above the vast space.
sentences.chinese: 云层很壮观，观者也有一望无垠的感觉。

sentences.english: From the boundless expanse of the east coast to the mountains of Kunlun Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 从浩瀚无垠的东海之滨到巍峨的昆仑山下。

sentences.english: The infinite sky is motionless overhead And the restless water is boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 头上无垠的天空静止，不息的海水狂暴。

sentences.english: The boundless sea and vast blue sky constitute beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 大海无垠，晴空朗阔，这景致真美啊。

definition: to stretch as far as the eye can see (idiom)
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
extremely vast/boundless/limitless/digressing/discursive/going off on tangents/straying far off topic
